TypeSignature.Value: .class public interface auto ansi abstract IDataEnvironment

summary.span: 定义一个数据服务接口，控件设计人员可以通过该接口将数据存储区或与数据库相关的功能集成到设计环境中。

span.span: Defines an interface to data services that enables control designers to integrate data store or database-related functionality into their design environment.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 一个对象，实现接口可以访问到应用程序在设计时可用的数据连接。An object that implements the interface can access the data connections available to an application at design time. 接口提供了方法来列出可用的数据连接、 创建新的数据连接、 从连接中检索架构信息和将数据连接的配置信息保存到应用程序的配置文件。The interface provides methods to list available data connections, create new data connections, retrieve schema information from a connection, and save data-connection configuration information to the application's configuration file. 接口可以与设计环境中的数据连接进行交互，但它不是作为数据管理 API。The interface enables you to interact with data connections in the design environment, but it is not intended as a data-management API.

MemberSignature.Value: public System.ComponentModel.Design.Data.DesignerDataConnection BuildConnection (System.Windows.Forms.IWin32Window owner, System.ComponentModel.Design.Data.DesignerDataConnection initialConnection);

.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance class System.ComponentModel.Design.Data.DesignerDataConnection BuildConnection(class System.Windows.Forms.IWin32Window owner, class System.ComponentModel.Design.Data.DesignerDataConnection initialConnection) cil managed
Public Function BuildConnection (owner As IWin32Window, initialConnection As DesignerDataConnection) As DesignerDataConnection

public: System::ComponentModel::Design::Data::DesignerDataConnection ^ BuildConnection(System::Windows::Forms::IWin32Window ^ owner, System::ComponentModel::Design::Data::DesignerDataConnection ^ initialConnection);
abstract member BuildConnection : System.Windows.Forms.IWin32Window * System.ComponentModel.Design.Data.DesignerDataConnection -> System.ComponentModel.Design.Data.DesignerDataConnection

span.span: The parent window for the connection dialog.

param.name: initialConnection

span.span: The connection, if any, to edit.

param.span: 若要创建新连接，则 应为 。

span.span: To create a new connection, should be .

summary.span: 使用设计工具的新连接用户界面创建新的数据连接或编辑现有连接。

span.span: Creates a new data connection or edits an existing connection using the design tool's new connection user interface.

returns.span: 一个新的或编辑过的 对象，如果用户取消操作，则为 。

span.span: A new or edited object, or if the user canceled.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用方法，以激活设计环境的用户界面，用于创建或编辑数据连接。Use the method to activate the design environment's user interface for creating or editing data connections. 如果`initialConnection`参数是`null`，它指示用户想要创建新的连接。If the `initialConnection` parameter is `null`, it indicates the user wants to create a new connection. 如果`initialConnection`参数是对象，则表示用户想要编辑现有连接。If the `initialConnection` parameter is a object, it indicates the user wants to edit an existing connection. 在设计环境负责创建数据连接，将连接添加到连接的全局列表或 Web 应用程序的配置文件，并添加到新的连接属性。Your design environment is responsible for creating the data connection, adding the connection either to a global list of connections or to the Web application's configuration file, and adding the new connection to the property. 新的连接应包括应用程序需要在运行时创建的数据连接的信息。The new connection should include the information that the application needs to create a data connection at run time. 如果你需要在设计环境中使用的数据连接，使用方法以返回将从在设计环境连接到数据存储的对象。If you need to use the data connection in the design environment, use the method to return a object that will connect to the data store from the design environment. 如果用户选择取消新连接创建过程中，方法应返回`null`。If the user chooses to cancel the new connection creation process, the method should return `null`.

MemberSignature.Value: public string BuildQuery (System.Windows.Forms.IWin32Window owner, System.ComponentModel.Design.Data.DesignerDataConnection connection, System.ComponentModel.Design.Data.QueryBuilderMode mode, string initialQueryText);

.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance string BuildQuery(class System.Windows.Forms.IWin32Window owner, class System.ComponentModel.Design.Data.DesignerDataConnection connection, valuetype System.ComponentModel.Design.Data.QueryBuilderMode mode, string initialQueryText) cil managed

public: System::String ^ BuildQuery(System::Windows::Forms::IWin32Window ^ owner, System::ComponentModel::Design::Data::DesignerDataConnection ^ connection, System::ComponentModel::Design::Data::QueryBuilderMode mode, System::String ^ initialQueryText);
abstract member BuildQuery : System.Windows.Forms.IWin32Window * System.ComponentModel.Design.Data.DesignerDataConnection * System.ComponentModel.Design.Data.QueryBuilderMode * string -> string

span.span: The parent window for the dialog.

param.name: connection
param.span: 要用于查询的数据连接。

span.span: The data connection to use for the query.
One of the values.

param.name: initialQueryText
param.span: 查询的初始值，或为 以创建新查询。

span.span: The initial value of the query or to create a new query.

summary.span: 启动一个对话框以生成 SQL 查询字符串。

span.span: Launches a dialog to build a SQL query string.

returns.span: 一个包含 SQL 查询的字符串，如果用户取消，则为 。

span.span: A string containing the SQL query, or if the user canceled.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法将启动用于编辑或创建的 SQL 查询字符串的设计环境的用户界面。The method launches the design environment's UI for editing or creating SQL query strings. 如果`initialQueryText`参数是，它指示用户想要创建一个新查询。If the `initialQueryText` parameter is , it indicates the user wants to create a new query. 如果`initialQueryText`参数包含一个字符串，它指示用户想要编辑现有查询。If the `initialQueryText` parameter contains a string, it indicates the user wants to edit the existing query. `mode`参数指示用户想要生成的查询的类型; 请选择更新、 插入或删除。The `mode` parameter indicates the type of query the user wants to build; either select, update, insert, or delete. 可以使用您的用户界面`mode`参数来将自己的类型的查询所需的配置，限制为仅为所需的查询的类型使用 SQL 语句有效用户和/或验证针对所需的类型的查询。Your user interface can use the `mode` parameter to configure itself for the type of query desired, limit the user to using SQL statements valid only for the type of query desired, and/or validate the query against the desired type.

MemberSignature.Value: public System.ComponentModel.Design.Data.DesignerDataConnection ConfigureConnection (System.Windows.Forms.IWin32Window owner, System.ComponentModel.Design.Data.DesignerDataConnection connection, string name);

.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance class System.ComponentModel.Design.Data.DesignerDataConnection ConfigureConnection(class System.Windows.Forms.IWin32Window owner, class System.ComponentModel.Design.Data.DesignerDataConnection connection, string name) cil managed
Public Function ConfigureConnection (owner As IWin32Window, connection As DesignerDataConnection, name As String) As DesignerDataConnection

public: System::ComponentModel::Design::Data::DesignerDataConnection ^ ConfigureConnection(System::Windows::Forms::IWin32Window ^ owner, System::ComponentModel::Design::Data::DesignerDataConnection ^ connection, System::String ^ name);
abstract member ConfigureConnection : System.Windows.Forms.IWin32Window * System.ComponentModel.Design.Data.DesignerDataConnection * string -> System.ComponentModel.Design.Data.DesignerDataConnection

param.name: owner
param.span: 该对话框的父窗口（如果有）。

span.span: The parent window for the dialog, if any.

param.name: connection
param.span: 一个 对象，包含要保存的连接数据。

span.span: A object containing the connection data to save.
The name of the new connection configuration entry.

summary.span: 将连接字符串写入应用程序的配置文件。

span.span: Writes a connection string to the application's configuration file.

returns.span: 一个包含保存的连接数据的 对象，该对象的 属性设置为 ， 属性设置为 。

span.span: A object containing the saved connection data with the property set to , and the property set to .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法将一个连接到应用程序的配置文件。The method writes a connection to the application's configuration file. 连接字符串和提供程序名称将写入[connectionStrings 元素 （ASP.NET 设置架构）](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/b6ffbb2e-a4d1-410e-8f7e-9755e92c65de)配置元素根据名为`name`参数。The connection string and provider name are written to the [connectionStrings Element (ASP.NET Settings Schema)](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/b6ffbb2e-a4d1-410e-8f7e-9755e92c65de) configuration element named according to the `name` parameter. 属性的`connection`参数将被忽略。The property of the `connection` parameter is ignored. 实现方法应引发以下异常。Implementations of the method should throw the following exceptions. |例外Exception|原因Reason| |---------------|------------| ||应用程序的配置文件中存在重复的名称。A duplicate name exists in the application's configuration file.| |，或其他相应的文件 IO 异常。, , or other appropriate file IO exception.|无法更新应用程序的配置文件。The application's configuration file cannot be updated. 你方法的实现应引发相应的异常。Your method implementation should throw an appropriate exception.| ||应用程序的配置文件不能从源代码管理系统签出。The application's configuration file cannot be checked out from the source control system.| 请考虑使用中的配置管理 Api命名空间读取和写入应用程序的配置文件。Consider using the configuration-management APIs in the namespace to read and write the application's configuration file. 类将读取和写入[connectionStrings 元素 （ASP.NET 设置架构）](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/b6ffbb2e-a4d1-410e-8f7e-9755e92c65de)配置元素。The class will read and write the [connectionStrings Element (ASP.NET Settings Schema)](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/b6ffbb2e-a4d1-410e-8f7e-9755e92c65de) configuration element.

MemberSignature.Value: public System.Collections.ICollection Connections { get; }
.property instance class System.Collections.ICollection Connections
Public ReadOnly Property Connections As ICollection
public: property System::Collections::ICollection ^ Connections { System::Collections::ICollection ^ get(); };
member this.Connections : System.Collections.ICollection

summary.span: 获取在当前设计会话中定义的数据连接的集合。

span.span: Gets a collection of data connections defined in the current design session.

value.span: 对象的集合，这些对象表示在当前设计会话中可用的数据连接。

span.span: A collection of objects representing the data connections available in the current design session.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性将返回可在设计时的连接组。The property returns the set of connections available at design time. 实现属性可返回当前 Web 应用程序中定义的连接列表或在全局级别，例如，在设计环境所维护的数据连接的列表定义的连接的列表。Your implementation of the property can return either the list of connections defined in the current Web application, or a list of connections defined at a global level, such as a list of data connections maintained by the design environment. 集合中的每个连接都应具有唯一的连接字符串。Each connection in the collection should have a unique connection string. 如果你的集合包括从应用程序的配置文件的连接和全局连接，您的实现必须处理来自全局列表和配置文件的连接具有相同的连接字符串的情况。If your collection includes both connections from the application's configuration file and global connections, your implementation must handle the case where connections from the global list and the configuration file have the same connection string. 在这种情况下，建议您消除重复项并使用该配置文件连接。In this case, it is recommended that you eliminate duplicates and use the configuration-file connection only.

param.name: connection
param.span: 要从应用程序的配置文件检索的连接。

span.span: The connection to retrieve from the application's configuration file.

summary.span: 返回一个代码表达式，该表达式包含从应用程序的配置文件检索连接字符串所需的源代码。

span.span: Returns a code expression that contains the source code required to retrieve a connection string from the application's configuration file.

returns.span: 一个 对象，包含从应用程序的配置文件检索连接字符串所需的源代码。

span.span: A object containing the source code required to retrieve a connection string from the application's configuration file.

abstract member GetConnectionSchema : System.ComponentModel.Design.Data.DesignerDataConnection -> System.ComponentModel.Design.Data.IDesignerDataSchema

param.name: connection
param.span: 要返回其架构信息的数据连接。

span.span: The data connection for which to return schema information.

summary.span: 获取指定数据连接的架构。

span.span: Gets the schema for the specified data connection.

returns.span: 一个 对象，包含指定数据连接的架构信息；如果无可用架构信息，则为 。

span.span: An object containing the schema information for the specified data connection, or if no schema information is available.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法返回指定的数据连接的数据库架构。The method returns the database schema for the specified data connection. 如果该架构不可用，或连接提供程序不可用，应返回`null`。If the schema is unavailable, or if the provider for the connection is unavailable, the should return `null`.

abstract member GetDesignTimeConnection : System.ComponentModel.Design.Data.DesignerDataConnection -> System.Data.Common.DbConnection

span.span: The desired data connection.

summary.span: 获取可以在设计时使用的数据库连接。

span.span: Gets a database connection that can be used at design time.

returns.span: 一个可以在设计时使用的 对象。

span.span: A object that can be used at design time.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法返回的有效的打开连接到可由控件设计器的数据存储区。The method returns a valid, open connection to the data store that can be used by the control designer. 控件设计器应使用以获取数据连接和不应尝试打开连接使用属性。Control designers should use the to obtain a data connection and should not attempt to open a connection using the property.
